tripleplay.anim
Class Animation

java.lang.Object
  tripleplay.anim.Animation
Direct Known Subclasses:
Animation.Action, Animation.Delay, Animation.Interped, Animation.Repeat
public abstract class Animation
extends Object

Represents a single component of an animation.

Nested Class Summary
static class Animation.Action
          An animation that executes an action and completes immediately.
static class Animation.Delay
          An animation that simply delays a specified number of seconds.
static class Animation.Interped<R>
          A base class for animations that interpolate values.
static class Animation.One
          An animation that animates a single scalar value.
static class Animation.Repeat
          An animation that repeats its underlying animation over and over again (until removed).
static class Animation.Two
          An animation that animates a pair of scalar values (usually a position).
static interface Animation.Value
          Used by animations to update a target value.
 
Method Summary
 boolean cancel()
          Cancels this animation.
 Animator then()
          Returns an animation factory for constructing an animation that will be queued up for execution when the current animation is completes.
 String toString()
           
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait
 

Method Detail

then

public Animator then()
Returns an animation factory for constructing an animation that will be queued up for execution when the current animation is completes.

cancel

public boolean cancel()
Cancels this animation. It will remove itself from its animator the next frame.

Returns:
true if this animation was actually running and was canceled, false if it had already completed.

toString

public String toString()
Overrides:
toString in class Object
